meanings.definition: To broadcast or transmit a television program or event.
meanings.sent1: The local news station telecasted the weather report last night.
meanings.sent2: The sports channel telecasted the soccer match live.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show telecasted a hilarious skit that had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The music awards were telecasted to millions of viewers around the world.
meanings.sent5: The documentary telecasted the wonders of nature in stunning detail.

meanings.sent1: Last night's telecasted was about space exploration.
meanings.sent2: I missed the telecasted of the award ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The telecasted of the old movie brought back nostalgic memories.
meanings.sent4: The telecasted of the play was a big hit with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The telecasted of the documentary was informative and engaging.
